name: Slay.one Desktop
description:
Slay.one is a fast-paced top-down multiplayer shooter with many exciting PVP and Co-op game modes. Select from a range of different weapons and slayers with unique abilities, make new friends and fight with other players online.

Features:

  • Fast-paced online action 
  • Secure dedicated server
  • Many game modes such as Infection, Team CTF, Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch and more!
  • Constantly adding new slayers, hundreds of different slayers are coming!
  • Constantly adding new weapons with new game mechanics, such as machine guns, shotguns, rifles, many types of laser weapons, heal guns, shotguns, rifles, sniper rifles, and many other weapons.
  • Lots of active players around the world. Super easy to find a fun match.

You can try the free web version by visiting https://slay.one/ (No install required).  

Also please help out the game development by donating if you like our game.
Try this desktop version and let us know your feedback, this is our first step towards bringing the Slay.one client version to Steam. Many new content and features are planned for the Steam version, such as better game performance, achievements and an improved rewards system! Steam players will also be able to create custom maps and game modes using the SlayEditor and then submit them to the Steam Workshop. 

Stay tuned!
